Group hierarchy: To cut costs, I assume I will charge users to stream videos in 720p. If 10% of daily sessions stream in 720p and I stream the rest in 480p, I will be able to reduce my CloudFront data transfer 23 TB. I also decided to keep only the current year's worth of data in S3 to reduce storage costs and elminated snapshotting on the streaming server.
